Veronica Waceke bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri.  O bu ụzọ pụta na ihe nkiri afọ 2015 Fundi-Mentals  Maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri My Faith, Waceke ritere ihe nrite Best East African Female Actress na Mashariki Film Festival.  O gosipụtara Lesedi na Kenya National Theatre nke Walter Sitati's play; Necessary Madness 2 na Deliberate Contempt n'afọ 2019.  A họpụtara Waceke maka 2014 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Award for the Best Actress in a television drama series 'Higher Learning'.
Onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma - Riverwood Awards
Best Actress - Mashariki Film Festival Awards afọ 2015
